column4: Can anyone tell me if it's possible to disable IPV6 in the live CD without installing to HD?
it certainly should, just about everything is possible on the live cd, as long as RAM doesn't fall short
!es > [Chiko_Gogo]     ([Chiko_Gogo] , see the private message from Ubotu)
Great!  Is anyone able to tell me how to do that?  I know how to do it if I install, i'm not sure how to start with it disabled from the live cd.
